name: GCMAN
descr: [GCMAN](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0036) is a threat group that focuses on targeting banks for the purpose of transferring money to e-currency services. (Citation: Securelist GCMAN)

subtechniques.name: SSH
subtechniques.descr: [GCMAN](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0036) uses Putty for lateral movement.(Citation: Securelist GCMAN)

subtechniques.name: VNC
subtechniques.descr: [GCMAN](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0036) uses VNC for lateral movement.(Citation: Securelist GCMAN)

Securelist GCMAN.description: Kaspersky Lab's Global Research & Analysis Team. (2016, February 8). APT-style bank robberies increase with Metel, GCMAN and Carbanak 2.0 attacks. Retrieved April 20, 2016.
